name: After the End with Miaobot
description:
This is my submission for Friendship Jam! You can get the soundtrack on Bandcamp.

Your home, the Underground Sector, has been all but decimated by the Sky Sector's brutal counterattack. With no other survivors in sight, you now find yourself before a mechanical cat who seems to want to be your friend. There are eight different endings.

CONTROLS

Move/interact - WASD or arrow keys

Advance dialogue - any key

(Swipe to move if using touch screen)

CREDITS

Story, art, and music by Alex Huang (@LydianChord)

Game made with Bitsy and Bitsy hacks (transparent sprites, basic sfx)

You can view the source code here.
